name: PoSecCo ModelMaintainer
short_description:
The PoSecCo ModelMaintainer consists of 4 tools (CMDB Transformer, CrossLayerLink tool, ServiceProviderTemplate tool and  StatusSetter tool) related to the automated model creation and population of the PoSecCo Functional System model.

All tools were developed in the EU project PoSecCo (Policy and Security Configuration Management, www.posecco.eu).

- The CMDBTransformer extracts information about the service provider’s landscape from the CMDB and creates instances of the Infrastructure layer of the PoSecCo FSM.
- The CrossLayerLink tool supports the maintenance of the cross-layer links between the instances of the three layers of the PoSecCo FSM.
- The ServiceProviderTemplate tool can be used to create landscape models for the suppliers, in the case they are not using the PoSecCo tools.
- The StatusSetter Tool displays the completion status of the PoSecCo FSM and its layers and allows to modify it.

All tools are developed in Java with Liferay portlets as User Interface.
summary: The ModelMaintainer contains 4 tools needed to create the PoSecCo FSM.
